messages.agent_message: I can also create a new account for you. Would you like to do that today?
What account type would you like to create?
messages.user_message: Please create a college fund account.

messages.agent_message: Ok. Your new account was created, but you need to transfer some funds into this new account to open it. If you specify an account, I can transfer a small amount of funds from that to your new account.
Please specify the account you want to select.
A college fund account was successfully created with starter funds transferred from savings.
Would you like to send any funds to a contact today?
Alright, who would you like to send funds to and how much?
Which account would you like to select for this task?
Ok! I just e-transferred 88 to Sandra from chequing.
You have a few outstanding bills. Would you like to pay them off now?
Which bill would you like to pay off?
messages.user_message: I want to pay off my internet bill.

messages.agent_message: Please specify the account you want to select.
Ok, I'm paying your internet bill from your savings account.
Are you expecting funds from any of your contacts?
Ok! I won't request money from any of your contacts today.
Are you looking to perform any transfers today?
Ok! Please specify the funds you which to transfer and the accounts to transfer between.
messages.user_message: Can I transfer 5000 from chequing to college fund?

messages.agent_message: Transferring 5000 from chequing to college fund...
All done. Have a nice day!
